page.title: 02I Live In Weston U Wetherley
page.content: Before school I have to see my pony to make sure he is alright.I go back and get ready for school then go to the bus stop.At school I do Maths, English, HE, PE, Swimming, Geography, Science, and a few other things.My teacher is called Mr.Nutt.After school I ride my pony either in the field or on the road.My pony is called Speckles.I usually go out with my friend Sally.When I have ridden I go and have my tea and give my girth a rub with saddle soap because it is hard to clean.My Mum is called Isobell and she is 33yrs of age,she works as a nurse at Weston Hospital 3 days a week.My Dad works at Stratford as a mechanic.His name is Bob and he is 36 yrs old.My sister is called Lucy and is 7.She often has a ride on Speckles.
